fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Fortify a player's house during the night, permanently increasing their Defense by one level. 3 Uses.
- Scrutinize a player during the day. 2 Uses.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- When you scrutinize a player, you will be given 2 subalignments (Protective, Support, etc.) One of these subalignments is your target's subalignment.
- Roleblock & Control Immunity
